readable.title: 3712574653_e009f76d19
readable.content: A girl stands up with a glass of beer to make a toast at a couple 's wedding . A lady brings a drink to a seated couple comprised of a woman wearing a long white dress and a man in a dark suit . A newlywed couple speak with guests at their wedding . Several people sit at a table in formal clothing . The bride and groom are getting served a drink at their wedding reception .
